actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to protect against using Federal Funds to undermine Federal standards of employment.

summary.text: Requires State and local governments, if they wish to qualify for funds under the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972, to certify that no individuals are employed by them under conditions which do not conform to the conditions of employment, including minimum wage, recordkeeping, overtime pay, and others, described in the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938.

titles.title: A bill to protect against using Federal Funds to undermine Federal standards of employment.
